title: What's the best song by Maroon 5? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maroon 5 is an amazing band or was a band, now most of the time adam is the only one we see. But thats totally there personal problem, the song by this band are unique and very special because it fits with the circumstances very easily. If you hav’nt heard them, listwn to them for once, you will love there songs. My list is as follows: she will be loved ( if the girl is under some sort of trouble)payphone ( if you are on the phone and you wana tell her old stuffs you both did together)love sombody ( if you are all alone,😂 say this songs while watching your hands💦)one more night ( if you did somthing wrong and you wana ask her to give you one more chance)Animals ( if you are gona score tonight)this love ( when you have to tell your friends, how did you played last night)sugar ( when she asks you, how muchyou love me?)daylight ( when you are getting late for your office, but she says ‘ tell me somthing good about me or amuse me’)wont go home without you ( when you had already booked the dinner and room, but she had other plans)best 4 you ( when she had already left you, but you want to be the bigger man and wish her best of luck for the future)I can go on and on, i really like that band.
